title: About Me
text:

Iâ€™ve always been passionate about engineering, technology, and problem solving as a kid. I feel like that passion has stuck with me this whole time and has given me the chance to be where I am now, trying to make that next jump to advancing my knowledge. My undergrad was in Automation Engineering Technology as I had a big interest in automation, robotics, and being a bit hands on with thingsğŸ¤–.
Towards the end of my undergrad, I was exposed to AI and data science through my capstone project. My group and I were lucky enough to experiment and test whether we coould create models to predict live EEG signals for directional thoughtsğŸ¤¯. It was definately an ambitious challenge as none of us had the background for it, but the exposure in that project grabbed my attention and I havenâ€™t been able to stop thinking about it (Peer Reviewed Journal of My Capstone).
I hope that down the line in my career, Iâ€™m able to combine all my passions for automation, robotics and AI to hopefully work on the line of smart robots, whether thatâ€™s through computer vision, path finder algorithms or much more complex ideas that havenâ€™t been experimented on, I hope to be able to contribute to itğŸ‘¨â€ğŸ’».
I enjoy playing golf in my spare timeğŸŒ, still terrible at it but thatâ€™s part of the joy (Iâ€™ve broken 100 twice!). I also used to play and collect pokemon cards, my favourite pokemon are Snorlax, Pikachu, Mew and Mewtwo! I donâ€™t try to hide my playful nature but rather try to harness it as I find it help drive my curiousity and allows me to try things without considering the fear of failure.
